Package covidSimulation

Class RecoveredAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • covidSimulation.Agent
      • covidSimulation.RecoveredAgent
  • public class RecoveredAgent
extends Agent
    A person who has recovered can not anymore be infected because she has developped antibodies against Covid.
    Author:
    Natacha

        Parameters:
        goal - the goal of the agent
        age - the age of the agent
        atRisk - a boolean equal to true if this agent has an increased risk due to medical conditions
        hasMask - a boolean equal to true if the agent wears a mask
